chordsearch.title: Finder
chordsearch.description: Search for guitar chords and their constituent notes, and keys to hold down.

keep.title: Keep
keep.description: List the codes added to the keep in the code search.

scrapbook.title: SCRAPBOOK
scrapbook.description: Displays a table of fifths and diatonic chords. Check more basic chords.

toppage.warning: [Warning]Keep and other information will be reset when you reload the browser.

empty.msg: The code has not been registered in Keep yet. Please register it first.

tips.keepbutton: Temporarily save the currently displayed code to Keep.
